message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a high-quality item that has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional performance and durability. Considering its superior features and craftsmanship, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I am offering it to you for $150. This is an exclusive opportunity, so let me know if you're interested.

I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I've done some research and found similar products in the market for that price. I'm willing to make a deal at $120, but I'm not sure if you can meet me there. Can you consider it?
